heading: Benefits
list: The Award gives the recipient the opportunity to be recognized as a 21U21 achiever.
The recipient will be awarded a trophy and recommended on LinkedIn from Girlscript Foundation.
The recipient will be showcased on the website and will receive swags.
The recipient will get access to an online network with fellow awardees to share resources, support the global community of people in tech, and collaborate on projects to make continued impact.
